class.name: project.conf.resource.ormapper.dto.oracle.UsrFinance
class.meta: Financial Loan Related Data Entry (Repayment / Borrowing / Lending)

hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT FINANCE_ID, TO_CHAR(FINANCE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS FINANCE_DATE, FINANCE_ENTRY_TYPE, FINANCE_TYPE_ID, FINANCE_YEAR, IS_COMPLETED, ORG_ID, QUARTER_NAME, DESCRIPTION, TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS END_DATE, TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, INTEREST_PERCENTAGE, PRINCIPAL_AMT, REPAYMENT_AMT, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID FROM USR_FINANCE WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy} FOR UPDATE

INSERT INTO USR_FINANCE ( FINANCE_ID, FINANCE_DATE, FINANCE_ENTRY_TYPE, FINANCE_TYPE_ID, FINANCE_YEAR, IS_COMPLETED, ORG_ID, QUARTER_NAME, DESCRIPTION, END_DATE, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, INTEREST_PERCENTAGE, PRINCIPAL_AMT, REPAYMENT_AMT, START_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID ) VALUES ( ${FINANCE_ID}, ${FINANCE_DATE}, ${FINANCE_ENTRY_TYPE}, ${FINANCE_TYPE_ID}, ${FINANCE_YEAR}, ${IS_COMPLETED}, ${ORG_ID}, ${QUARTER_NAME}, ${DESCRIPTION}, ${END_DATE}, ${INSERT_DATE}, ${INSERT_USER_ID}, ${INTEREST_PERCENTAGE}, ${PRINCIPAL_AMT}, ${REPAYMENT_AMT}, ${START_DATE}, ${UPDATE_DATE}, ${UPDATE_USER_ID} )

UPDATE USR_FINANCE SET FINANCE_DATE = ${FINANCE_DATE}, FINANCE_ENTRY_TYPE = ${FINANCE_ENTRY_TYPE}, FINANCE_TYPE_ID = ${FINANCE_TYPE_ID}, FINANCE_YEAR = ${FINANCE_YEAR}, IS_COMPLETED = ${IS_COMPLETED}, ORG_ID = ${ORG_ID}, QUARTER_NAME = ${QUARTER_NAME}, DESCRIPTION = ${DESCRIPTION}, END_DATE = ${END_DATE}, INSERT_DATE = ${INSERT_DATE}, INSERT_USER_ID = ${INSERT_USER_ID}, INTEREST_PERCENTAGE = ${INTEREST_PERCENTAGE}, PRINCIPAL_AMT = ${PRINCIPAL_AMT}, REPAYMENT_AMT = ${REPAYMENT_AMT}, START_DATE = ${START_DATE}, UPDATE_DATE = ${UPDATE_DATE}, UPDATE_USER_ID = ${UPDATE_USER_ID} WHERE 1 = 1 ${frameworkGeneratedWhere}
